name: Transit Issue Recorded
query:
SELECT 
type_of_issue AS 'Type of Issue:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(tb.type_of_issue) from `tabTransit Issue` tb where tb.type_of_issue = ti.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Issue Closed' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),tb.creation) < 91) as 'Closed:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(tb.type_of_issue) from `tabTransit Issue` tb where tb.type_of_issue = ti.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Pending for Finance Team Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),tb.creation) < 91) as 'Pending with Finance Team:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(tb.type_of_issue) from `tabTransit Issue` tb where tb.type_of_issue = ti.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Requested for More Details by Supply Team' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),tb.creation) < 91) as 'More info requested to Sales Team:Data:250'
FROM
`tabTransit Issue` ti
GROUP BY
type_of_issue
UNION
SELECT 'Grand Total', CAST(sum(ti.workflow_state = 'Issue Closed') AS int), CAST(sum(ti.workflow_state = 'Pending for Finance Team Approval') AS int), CAST(sum(ti.workflow_state = 'Requested for More Details by Finance Team') AS int) from `tabTransit Issue` ti;
